prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with vibrant purple skin and yellow spikes on its head.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon that combines elements of rock and electric types in its design.
Generate a character that embodies the spirit of a lively and mischievous electric Pokemon.
Imagine a dual-type Pokemon that thrives in urban environments with a unique punk rock aesthetic.
Make a Pokemon with a fierce appearance, showcasing bright colors and a dynamic pose.
Design a quirky Pokemon that has a musical theme, incorporating electric elements in its design.
Give me an electric Pokemon that has a playful but slightly rebellious personality.
